column1: back of a length and skids on off stump, punchily played up to the covers
shortish and width outside off, Dickwella throws his bat at the ball with his feet pinned to the crease. He squeezes an inside edge that bounces over the leg stump
back of a length on a fifth-stump line outside off, Tharanga leans back, opens the face, and punches the ball straight to backward point
short and slanted in on top of off stump, Junaid hits 140ks, jabbed back to him
shortish and outside off, stabbed straight to backward point again
Junaid keeps it short and outside off, Tharanga goes hard at the ball, loses his shape, and miscues it to backward point to wrap up the over
back of a length and outside off, Dickwella gets on top of the bounce and glides a single to third man

Usman strikes with his second ball on ODI debut. He storms through the defences of Tharanga and pegs the middle stump back. Bowled through the gate. This is an excellent delivery: full and skids back into the left hander. The speedgun reads 137ks but it looked quicker than that, beating Tharanga, who dared to play across the line. He does not make contact. Usman hits
full on middle from over the wicket, tapped down to mid-on
back of a length and angling across off, patted to midwicket
on a length and outside off, crisply driven on the up to mid-off
good length, angling away, seaming away outside off, Chandimal hangs his bat out in the channel and is beaten on the outside edge
Dickwella hits over the top and brings up SL's first boundary. Good length and outside off, he extends his arms and lifts it over extra cover
length ball on off stump, Dickwella hits over the top again. This nearly goes all the way. Hoisted over midwicket. One-bounce four
lifter outside off, flies off the surface, beats the big hook and the leaping Sarfraz behind the stumps. Was it a wide? Nope, given four byes
full, slower ball on the leg stump, 115ks, the batsman spots the change-up and flicks it through the vacant spaces at midwicket
back of a length on off stump, Chandimal opens the face and jabs the ball to the cover-point region
back of a length and nips back in, Chandimal jams an inside edge onto the pad
full and wide outside off, this keeps low, Dickwella has an almighty slash at it and bottom-edges it behind to Sarfraz
pretty full and angling into the pads, Dickwella stylishly picks it up and whips it over midwicket. He won't hold back
good length and slanting in on middle and leg, Dickwella hangs back and bunts it back down the pitch to mid-on
full and outside off, Chandimal leans into a drive but forgets about placement. Stroked straight to cover
Chandimal gets off the mark after eight balls. Banged in short and angled across off, Chandimal arches his back and expertly ramps it fine of third man. Great execution from Chandimal
good length and angling away, finishes on a fourth-stump line, punched on the up but straight to mid-off
Dickwella steps down and outside leg, Junaid holds his own and spears a yorker on middle, jabbed away to cover
floaty slower ball on leg stump, 116ks, Dickwella spots the change-up and glances it straight to short fine leg

Dickwella has scooped Junaid for a six! That's the Dickscoop. He had meted out the same treatment to Rabada earlier this year. He knows fine leg is inside the circle, and nimbly shuffles across off stump. Junaid sends down a back-of-a-length ball outside off. The batsman gets inside the line and ramps it over the boundary
slower cutter outside off, tapped to cover
good length, angled in, and straightens away past the outside edge. Top response from Junaid

Dickwella marches down the track and holes out to extra cover. Junaid has his revenge. He lets out an animated roar. Dickwella slinks down but Junaid holds his own and bowls it full on middle. Dickwella gets too close to the pitch and carves it to Zaman
back of a length on leg stump, cramps the batsman for room, tucked to square leg
full and angling in towards off stump, played back down the pitch
bouncer outside off, 136ks, forces the batsman to duck under it
back of a length and outside off, directed down to deep third man
back of a length and angling away just a shade outside off, punched up to cover
shortish and skids on outside off, 141ks, Chandimal chops it to backward point
full and holds its line outside off, Tharanga opens the face and guides the ball to backward point
on a length and outside off, Thirimanne slices it but can't get it past Shadab at backward point
full on the stumps, driven straight of mid-on for one

full on middle, Chandimal twirls his wrists and whips it away past the right of midwicket. Zaman chases the ball, and puts in a desperate dive, but he had no chance to cut that off. Sweetly timed by Chandimal
floated full and outside off, Chandimal flows forward and drives it wide of mid-off for one
back of a length around off, defended square on the off side
clipped off the hips to the right of square leg. Imam ends up diving over the ball
short and slanting away outside off, slashed hard to backward point. The ball bursts through the hands of Shadab. Sarfraz isn't pleased
back of a length and outside off, Thirimanne sizes it up and punches on the up, finding the gap between backward point and cover

Usman errs in line, he bangs a short ball down leg, left alone. Sarfraz throws himself to his right but the ball pops out of his glove and streaks away to the boundary. Sarfraz has his hands on his head
back of a length and holds its line just a shade outside off, caressed to cover off the front foot
full on the stumps, nearly 140ks, driven ram-rod straight down the ground, so much so it hits the stumps at the non-striker's end and ricochets it wide of mid-on
back of a length on the hips, deflected behind square on the leg side
short non-turner on off, punched back down the pitch
Chandimal nips down the track but does not get close enough to the pitch, inside-edges the ball to mid-on
pushed through flatter and quicker on off, squeezed back to Imad
fast skidder on off stump, stabbed to the leg side off an inside edge
90ks dart outside off, down the track and driven down the ground for one
94ks dart outside off, past the tramline, wide
pushed through on the leg stump, Thirimanne spears a single down to long-on
shortish and angling into a solid defence on off stump
good length and outside off, Thirimanne moves forward and drives on the up to cover

good length and angling in on off, driven to the left of mid-off. Imad slides and his knee gets jarred into the turf, creating an indentation. Mind you, Imad is returning from a knee injury. He needs medical attention. Sarfraz is concerned
loopy, straight ball on middle, which is pushed down to long-off
Hafeez loops another one on off, driven towards long-on
flighted high on middle, eased down to long-on for one more
fired outside off, 91ks, Thirimanne flashes in the channel... and misses
pushed through on the stumps, Thirimanne secures a single down to long-on

An awful mix-up between the wickets! Short midwicket fumbles. Farcical cricket all around. Awful throw. Sarfraz runs in front of the stumps, gathers the throw, flings himself forward, and catches Chandimal short at the striker's end. This was slid through on middle, Chandimal skipped out and clipped it away to shortmidwicket's right, who misfields. Chandimal is more than halfway down the pitch. Thirimanne sells him down the river. Sarfraz made that throw from Shehzad look a lot better
tossed up on off, played back to the bowler

Sadeera bags a duck on ODI debut. This was the flat inducker from Imad - skids back into the right hander from around the wicket. Sadeera plays back to a fuller one and misses it completely; he was late to bring his bat down. Timbaaaaah
full and holds its line outside off, driven crisply to the off-side sweeper
lobbed up on middle, straight ball, bunted down to long-on for one
full and drifts in on middle, nudged to short midwicket
length ball on off, blocked to cover off the front foot
tossed up liberally on middle, played back to Hafeez
skids into the leg stump, Thirmanne falls over the flick, and misses the ball
Thirmanne steps down the track, Hafeez pulls his length back outside off. Quietly hit down to long-off
speared outside off, driven through the line to mid-off
darted short on middle, Thirimanne sits back and swats it to long-on
full and sliding across off from around the wicket, zips past the outside edge
Thirimanne uses the pace of the bowler and chops to backward point
full on the stumps, played back to the bowler
sliding away outside off, full, chopped square of short third man
straight ball on middle, patted square on the off side for one
pushed through on middle, down the track and driven down to long-on
slides into the leg stump, and cramps the batsman for room, blocked back to the bowler
tossed on middle, defended back to him again
full and straight, nurdled to midwicket
straight ball on middle, quicker through the air, as Thirimanne uses his feet and pushes a single down to long-off
length, floated across off stump. Pushed to extra cover on the up
good length at middle stump, tapped back down the pitch
length ball skids at leg stump, deflects through short fine as he looks to swipe at it
back of a length in the corridor, poked to extra cover off the back foot
length, angled across off stump, opens the face and guides it wide of short third man
length at off stump, dropped in front of short third man with soft hands
tossed up at off stump, steps out and skews it off the inside half, down the pitch
tossed up at off stump, can't beat extra cover's dive with the drive. Sarfraz runs 30 yards to high five the fielder, Imam Ul Haq
back of a length at off stump, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
back of a length at middle stump, pushed to midwicket's right off the back foot
tossed up at off stump, steps out and punches straight back to the bowler
good length, angled in at leg stump. Goes deep in the crease and whips it to deep midwicket
starts with a full one on middle stump, stands tall and clips this to the midwicket boundary
back of a length at middle stump, poked wide of mid-on off the back foot
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
length at middle stump, pushed through midwicket
good length at middle stump, defended into the off side
good length, angled across the corridor. Defended down the pitch
good length at off stump, pushed down the pitch on the up
good length at off stump, pushed to extra cover on the front foot
good length at off stump, tapped to extra cover on the up
tossed up at off stump, steps out and drives to long-off
good length outside off, steps out and chips it wide of long-off
back of a length at off stump, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
back of a length, angled in at middle stump. Flicked to fine leg's right
back of a length outside off, tapped to sweeper cover on the up
back of a length outside off, pushed wide of mid-on
short and in at off stump, controlled pull to deep square
good length and angled in at leg stump. An offcutter. Turned through midwicket
bouncer, angled down leg side. Lets it fly past his right shoulder
tossed up at middle stump, driven to long-off
back of a length at off stump, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
tossed up outside off, steps out and drives to long-off
good length at middle stump, defended into the off side
good length at off stump, steps out and taps it towards long-off. Hafeez dives to stop
good length, steps out and is beaten on flight. It slides into his pad
good length, angled in at middle stump. Flicked to midwicket from the crease
good length outside off, tapped to extra cover off the toe-end
full outside off stump, squeezed to sweeper cover off the front foot
dangerous looking full toss at off stump. It's about thigh-height. He fends and keeps it out. Apology from Hasan. It is a legal delivery though

oh great catch! Usman Shinwari lunges forward and to his left to get his hands quickly under this flat one dipping at him fast. It's a short ball angled into the mid-riff, he swivels and pulls in the air. That didn't go too far above head height and dipped fast, but Shinwari was sharp at fine leg
full toss outside off, misfielded by point and that gives them the opportunity to come back for the second....and he has to dive to make it. Good throw from sweeper Imam
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
back of a length outside off, poked to sweeper cover
good length at off stump, pushed towards long-off. Dives to his left again, does Imam from extra cover, to stop it
back of a length outside off, sliced straight to short third man
tossed up at middle stump, flicked to long-on
back of a length at middle stump, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
back of a length outside off, dabbed to third man with an open face
back of a length in the corridor, defended into the off side
good length in the corridor, defended with a half stride
short ball outside off, looks to pull but this skids through from under his blade
back of a length in the corridor, dropped into the off side with soft hands
full outside off stump, driven firmly to mid-off
length at off stump, defneded down the pitch
length at middle, pushed down the pitch
length and angled in at leg stump. Inside edge onto pad as he looks to sweep
length at off stump, defended back to the bowler
back of a length outside off stump, punched to long-off off the back foot
pushed through outside off, non-turning ball, tapped to cover

... and he strikes with his first ball to leave Sri Lanka six down for 99. Googly, breaks back in on middle, Prasanna does not read the wrong'un and winds up for an ambitious slog sweep only to miss it

he's gone first ball! Shadab on a hat-trick. Good length at off stump, googly. He looks to flick but hasn't reached the pitch of the ball. Closes the face too early inevitably and the edge loops to first slip's left
back of a length at leg stump, hands deep in the crease and tucks it past midwicket
nearly lobs it back to the bowler. Length ball at off stump, stretches forward and taps it back aerially down the pitch. On the bounce to Shadab
back of a length at leg stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
back of a length at leg stump, defended into the leg stump
good length at middle stump, defended off the inside half of the bat
good length at middle stump, defended down the pitch
good length at off stump, defended off the inside half
full and drifted in at leg stump, squeezed to midwicket off the inside edge
in the air but safely wide of short leg. Length ball, poked with hard hands
full at leg stump, defended into the leg side
googly, back of a length outside off, sliced off the back foot to deep point
good length, googly at off stump. Defended into the off side
good length and angled in at leg stump, tickled fine off the inside half of the bat. Was looking to flick without getting to the pitch
full at middle stump, flicked to midwicket
back of a length slider at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
good length, pushed through flat and cops him on the front pad as he looks to flick
tossed up at off stump, driven to long-off
tossed up at middle stump, flicked to midwicket
good length at leg stump, driven back down the pitch
length at off stump, defended through cover point
back of a length at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
tossed up at off stump, steps out and drives to long-off
googly, dropped short outside off. He's quickly onto the back foot to slash this through point. Good shot, poor ball
back of a length at leg stump, flicked past short leg off the back foot
good length at middle stump, turned past short leg on the up
back of a length at middle stump, pushed back at the bowler, mistimed
back of a length at leg stump, dabbed to long leg off the back foot
back of a length at leg stump, flicked to square leg off the back foot
good length, floated at middle stump.Plonks the front leg across and paddles it wide of long leg
good length at off stump, steps out and inside edges onto pad as he looks to drive
back of a length outside off, punched to point off the back foot
good shot. Tossed up outside off, big stride forward and swipes beautifully across the line and places the sweep perfectly over midwicket
good length at off stump, tapped back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, chopped to sweeper cover's right
good length at middle stump, flicked with the turn
back of a length at middle stump, tapped into the leg side off the back foot
back of a length, pitches on leg stump, spins further down and past the attempted glance
length outside off stump, flicked to midwicket
dropped short at middle stump, pulled straight to deep midwicket
back of a length into the body, flicked to square leg
back of a length at leg stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
back of a length outside off from wide of the crease, dabbed to third man
back of a length at off stump, poked to point with an angled bat
full outside off, pushed to extra cover
short one, angled in at the body. Deflected to Sarfraz's right off the thigh guard
attempted yorker goes wrong. Met on the full outside off stump and tapped past extra cover. Sweeper runs to his left and cleans up
good length outside off, slices away from the body, straight to point
back of a length at middle stump, climbs on him as he sits on the back foot. Tapped to midwicket
tossed up outside off, stretches out and flicks to midwicket
full outside off, flicked to midwicket's right
back of a length and ripping in at middle stump, backs away and pushes it through point
good length at middle stump, flicked to midwicket's right
leading edge lands short of the bowler again. Closes the face too early on this attempted flick
short of a length and heading towards the midriff, the batsman capably works it through midwicket for a single
Thirimanne rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and secures a single to third man
back of a length and angling down the leg side, Dananjaya can't tickle it away. Leg-side wide
back of a length and holds its line outside off, Dananjaya has a lousy waft at it... and misses
good length and hung up wide outside off again, draws another loose prod from Dananjaya, and beats him on the outside edge
short and outside off, helped down to third man with an angled bat
Thirimanne brings up a fifty amid Sri Lanka's slump. Pitched up and outside off, invites the drive. Thirimanne obliges and creams it between cover and mid-off
floated up outside off, down the track and hit away to long-on
quicker and breaks back in, this legbreak is clipped to square leg
tossed up on the pads, milked to fine leg for one
chopped from off stump to short third man. Risky shot from Dananjaya
short and turns into leg stump, this hip-high delivery is swatted away to deep square leg
lobbed up, full and outside off, Thirimanne leans into it and drives fluently through the covers
fullish and outside off, guided down to third man for one

Hasan has Dananjaya nicking behind and unleashes his trademark celebration - pumping his fists and stretching his arms out. What a sight. Words can't do justice to it. This was on a good length and hung up wide outside off. Hint of away movement. Dananjaya bites and edges it to Sarfraz behind the stumps
full and straying into the pads, picked off to long leg
Thirimanne rides the bounce of this short one outside off and glides it to third man
pitched up and outside off, 141ks, Lakmal does not care. He stands tall and swishes it past mid-off
good length and skids in to catch the pad as Lakmal hangs back and does not make contact with a flick
tossed outside off, whipped with the break through square leg
darted very full on middle, dug out to midwicket
flat legbreak, defended off the back foot
back of a length and turns back in on middle, Thirimanne aims to cut from there. He watches the ball dribble to cover
tucked through square leg for one
back of a length and outside off, Lakmal turns it to midwicket with no feet
speared very full on middle, skewed to midwicket off the inside half
Hasan shortens his length on off stump, Thirimanne stays leg side of the ball and glides a single to third man
back of a length on off stump, Lakmal clears his front leg and hauls it away towards deep midwicket
short and on off, 139ks, Lakmal now gets right behind the line in defence
short and width outside off, Lakmal chops hard to backward point
short of a length and outside off, Lakmal swivels on the back foot and pulls it firmly to deep midwicket
overpitched and outside off, Lakmal frees his arms and clatters a drive through extra cover. It was too full from Shadab
quicker googly - breaks back in - and cramps Lakmal for room. Tickled off an inside edge to short fine leg
full and straight outside off, driven through the line to long-off
the googly again, fuller, flatter, snakes back in to rap the front pad but it would have headed past leg stump
another googly, Lakmal reads this and blocks off the front foot

What a ripper from Shadab. Oh my, how did that miss the off stump. Shadab follows a brace of googlies with a conventional legbreak. Starts on leg stump, breaks away sharply, and bounces over off stump. Or not. Ultra Edge suggests the ball kissed the bail but it refused to budge
full on off, stabbed back to the bowler

shortish and outside off, chopped away to backward point. Again, there is a mix-up between the wickets. Thiri wants the single. Lakmal is ball-watching. Imam was late to spot the ball too. He then dives, collects the ball, but can't throw the stumps down at the bowler's end. They eventually complete the single
full on middle, patted to midwicket
full and wide outside off, caressed to the off-side sweeper
good length on off stump, pushed back to the bowler

Imad returns and has Thirimanne scooping a catch to Babar at extra cover. Pushed through and sliding across off from around the wicket, Thirimanne simply chips it to the fielder. Soft end to a gritty innings
full inducker, Gamage squeezes a single to midwicket
on a length and skids back in, Lakmal sits back and squirts an inside edge onto the pad
flat dart on the leg stump, pings the pad, but this seems to be heading down leg with the angle from around the wicket
Lakmal uses his feet, the bowler fires it on middle, poked back to the bowler
speared on off stump, full, Lakmal drives a single to long-off and keeps strike
back of a length on off, Lakmal's bat turns in his hands as he jabs it to extra cover
inswinging yorker on off stump, Gamage somehow keeps it out
slower short ball outside off, sticks in the surface. Lakmal is early into a pull. He ends up flapping it in front of long-on
full on middle, Gamage presses forward and capably defends
Hasan eyes up a yorker, but ends up bowling a low full-toss on off, which is bunted to mid-off
pitched up on off, blocked off the front foot
fired on off, Lakmal swishes an inside edge to short fine leg
darted outside leg, Lakmal has an almighty swipe, and does not connect
darted flat and full on off, jammed out to short fine leg
tossed up slower on middle, down the track and whipped away through midwicket. Lakmal looks for the second, it's not there
dangled up on off, played back to the bowler off the front foot
Gamage uses his feet, Imad drags his length back and fires it on off stump. Inside edged back to the bowler
chest-high short ball on middle, Lakmal dares to hook and sends a top edge over backward square leg, beats Shadab to his right in the deep
short and wide outside off, flayed away to sweeper cover
back of a length on middle, down the track and hacked away to mid-off

Hasan, the new world no. 1, wraps up SL for 173 with another three-wicket haul. This is the slower offcutter, Gamage does not spot the change-up. He has a big heave at it, he does so early, and has his stumps rattled
back of a length, slight shape into the corridor. Sliced to third man
back of a length at middle stump, pushed to midwicket on the up
back of a length outside off, tapped away from the body to mid-off
back of a length outside off, defended into the off side
good length, dipping back in quickly and catches him on the pads as he looks to heave it through square leg. But that's sliding down
back of a length in the corridor, cramped on the back foot punch, ball rolls into the off side
good length and outside leg. He shuffles a tad and looks to flick. It was very close to leg stump as he missed it. But it's through the keeper's dive and five runs
full outside off, ginger poke away from the body, thick outside edge to third man
that shot, as a teenager would put it, was LIT AF. Full and angled across off stump, no feet as his hands line this up. Gets underneath it and slices it aerially over cover
full and in at off stump, once again no feet. Plays in front of his body and gets a thick inside edge down to fine leg

oh this has got to be out. Yes. Plumb in front. Full ball, right up at off stump. It's not a convincing shot - foot goes half a yard across the stumps and the head is falling over into the off side. He's off balance and the bat is angled as it comes down. Dead in front. Plays outside the line too
good length, wide outside off stump. A bit of movement away. Left alone
back of a length at middle stump, flicked past midwicket
back of a length, angled across off stump. Big slash at it, beaten by a long way
back of a length at middle stump, defended to mid-off off the back foot
back of a length at off stump, squeezes it to point with a slice
short and wide outside off, slashes and connects. Gets it past point but wide third man can clean up
mishit as he doesn't pick this offcutter. It's a length ball angled across off stump. Throws his hands at it and doesn't check his shot - manages to chip it wide of mid-off
short one in the corridor, too quick as he looks to pull. Under-edges into the leg side
back of a length in the corridor, poked into the covers on the up
overpitched at off stump, driven straight to mid-off
short ball in at the ribs. Mistimes the pull again, but it goes further this time with the angle, down to fine leg
back of a length outside off, shuffles and taps it into the turf towards point
well bowled. Angles it in towards the corridor from slightly wide of the crease, gets it to jag away past the outside edge
overpitched at off stump, half-stride-drive to mid-off
140 kph, back of a length, angled into the corridor. Cramped on the cut shot. Bunts it back down the pitch
offcutter, full outside off stump. Picks it and waits before driving straight to extra cover
back of a length, angled in at middle stump. Pushed wide of mid-on
back of a length in the corridor, shuffles and clips to square leg
back of a length outside off stump, swinging away a touch but no menace. Pushed to point with an open face
good length, shaped away in the corridor. Defended into the off side
overpitched outside off stump, driven straight to extra cover
back of a length, angled in at off stump. Defended down the pitch from the crease
back of a length in the corridor, poked to point on the up
oh he's cut through his defence. Zaman is desperate for room, but he's not getting any. This one zips in a long way from outside off stump and flies over middle stump
back of a length in the corridor, pushed to point
shot. There's the room. It's dropped short and his hands are automatically up to slash this to the square leg boundary
full at middle stump, driven on the up to mid-on's right
good length, angled down leg and past the flick

oh you beauty. What a shot that is. Back of a length in the corridor, a slight shuffle towards it and he stands on his toes to get on top of the bounce. Then gets the timing perfect to open the face and send this square drive to the fence
good length, shaping away outside off. Solidly defended into the covers
good length and in at the corridor, defended on the front foot
back of a length and wide outside off stump, slashes and finds backward point with the toe-end of the bat
lovely shot again, but he can't beat the fielder at mid-on. Back of a length in the corridor, very deep in the crease as he looks to punch this
slower ball with plenty of width. He doesn't pick it. Hard hands as he look to drive, beaten
good length, wide outside off, this time the ball slides through from under his bat as he slashes
back of a length and angled in this time. He looks to cut and nearly chops it onto the stumps. Short fine leg retrieves to his left
back of a length in he corridor. Goes on the front foot to drive, but this gets big on him
sweet. Full outside off stump, shape away but he's brought the bat down to smother it on the up and punch it past the non-striker
back of a length outside off. Loose poke at it with no feet, inside edge runs wide of midwicket
offspinner, good length at off stump. Defended into the leg side
tossed up at middle stump, tickled to short fine
good length at leg stump, turned to deep square from the crease
back of a length outside off stump, defended with a big gap between bat and pad

legspinner this time and it was spinning into the corridor. He might have had a good swing at this if he had stayed in the crease. But he chooses to go down. Nowhere near the pitch of this flat ball. Swings wildly and beaten by a long way
googly, good length at leg stump. Pushed into the leg side
shot. Once again, can't beat mid-on. Back of a length ball in the corridor, promptly whipped on the up with perfect connection
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
good length, wide outside off stump, left alone
good length outside off, pushed back to the bowler on the up
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
good length at middle stump, presses forward and turns it wide of mid-on
back of a length, keeps low as it spins back in at leg stump. Goes a long way back and punches this into the off side against the turn
back of a length at leg stump, poked to short fine
good length at leg stump, down the track to drive against the turn to long-on
googly, length outside off. Leading edge to point as he plays inside the line
legbreak, tossed up at middle stump. Flicked straight to midwicket
googly, back of a length and in at leg stump. Tapped to midwicket off the back foot
back of a length at leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
dropped. Prasanna gets down low as Hafeez meets this ball at the pitch and hits it back at him. It deflects wide of mid-on off his ankle
back of a length at off stump, punched to extra cover off the back foot
back of a length and down leg side, whipped to deep square
back of a length at off stump, punched to extra cover off the back foot
back of a length, slides through at off stump. Punched to long-off
niiiiice. Good length outside off, draws him forward and beats the outside edge with the legbreak

tossed up full outside off stump, caressed through the covers and the outfield is fast. But mid-off pulls it back after sprinting a long way...and the replays show he got ride of the ball before touching the boundary
offbreak. Good length outside off stump, waits for it and fends as it bounces back. Lobs off the pad over short leg. Not sure if there was an edge on that
full at middle stump, flicked through midwicket
googly, back of a length at off stump, punched to long-on
overpitched at off stump, waits for it to come on and drills it to the extra cover boundary
back of a length, angled down leg side, deflected fine off the pads
back of a length at off stump, defended to extra cover
length ball at middle stump, steps out and jams it straight. Long-off cleans up
full at off stump, defended onto the pad off the inside edge
full at off stump, driven to long-off

holes out to deep midwicket. Ordinary shot. Takes on the slog sweep at this length ball on middle stump, slices it straight to the fielder who was down early and had to adjust as it swerved to his left. Took it low
back of a length at middle stump, goes on the back foot and whips to deep midwicket
offbreak, tossed up outside off. Stretches forward and dead-bats it
back of a length, pushed through flat at middle stump. Flicked uppishly to deep midwicket
good length at off stump, defended down the pitch
inside edge lands in front of short leg. Good length, floated outside off. Pokes in front of his body with hard hands
tossed up at middle, down the track to get to the pitch and drive to long-on
tossed up at off stump, squeezed to sweeper cover
full at off stump, driven straight to extra cover
full at off stump, driven down to long-off
full, off stump, driven to long-off
good length at off stump, defended into the covers
good length at middle stump, forward defence
length-ball offbreak outside off, Malik steers through point
back of a length and turns in on off, the batsman hangs back and smartly works it through the vacant spaces at square leg
big offbreak - pitches on leg and spins down leg - leg-side wide
pitched up and outside off, caressed to extra cover off the front foot
on a length and breaks in on middle, defended to short leg off the back foot
Babar forays down the track and drives a full ball down to long-on
danged up outside off, Malik defends to short cover
pushed through on off, eased down to long-off
Bursts through the hands of Thisara leaping at mid-on. Fired on middle, Malik uses his feet and gets too close to the pitch to get enough elevation. He chips to mid-on. Thisara jumps and shells it
tossed up on off, defended
full on off, Malik bends forward and blocks it
floated full and outside off, Malik makes room and lashes it to cover
flighted and outside off, fluently driven past short cover's left
back of a length and on off stump, punched away past the right of mid-on
good length and slanted in on off, poked back to Lakmal
back of a length and skids on outside off, Babar slices a thick outside edge to third man
short on off, Malik chops it to point off the back foot
chest-high short ball on off, top-edges a hook to the right of mid-on
bouncer outside off, Babar drops his wrists
tossed up on middle, push-driven to cover with the turn
Malik steps out, the bowler pulls his length back on middle stump. Quietly blocked
full and just a shade outside off, Malik stays leg side of the ball and eases it through the gap at cover
tossed-up legbreak outside off, the batsman does not meet the pitch of the ball and ends up carving a drive to backward point
slides on leg stump, dead batted
short and wide outside off, Malik opens the face of the bat and steers it towards third man

shot, Malik! Just short of a good length and outside off, Malik stands up tall and crunches it in the gap between point and cover. Sadeera, the debutant, chases the ball hard, and slides, and pulls it back to the other chasing fielder
back of a length, picked off the hips to long leg
Malik leaps off the ground to meet this short ball outside off and deftly glide it to third man
bouncer on middle stump, floats through to the keeper as opposed to flying through, Babar ducks without any fuss
bouncer outside off, much faster, Babar ducks under again
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, Babar drops the  ball to backward point
nudged off the pads to the right of the leg umpire for one
looped up outside off, drilled to cover
Babar comes a long way down the track, Prasanna darts it quicker, and pings the front pad
Malik uses his feet now, this is hurled at the leg stump, slams the front pad. The ball balloons to midwicket where Tharanga dives and drops the ball
full on the stumps, defended
tossed up on off, played back to the bowler
short on off, wristily whipped to the right of midwicket and to the left of deep square leg. Dananjaya tumbles to his left and stops the ball
rising short ball on off, Malik rises with it and pats it down
overpitched and outside off, Malik belts it straight to short cover
Dananjaya tears it from deep midwicket but the ball lands in front of him. Lifter outside off, Malik can't control a hook. He gets away with a fat top edge
chest-high short ball on off, Babar is beaten for pace now. He top-edges a pull over midwicket
pitched up on a fourth-stump line, nibbles away, Malik prods with no feet and watches the ball beat the outside edge
tossed outside off, stretches out and drives to short cover
chopped from off stump to sweeper cover
pushed through on off, steered through the covers for one
full and outside off, the batsman forays down the track and belts it to sweeper cover
tossed on off, played back to him
slid through, the batsman comes down the track and is pinned on the front pad. He was a fair way down and the impact seemed just outside line too
full and outside off, bunted to short cover
pushed through flatter and quicker, turns in, clipped to the right of short leg
tossed on off, forward and smothered
Malik skips out, takes a full-toss from outside off and scoops to mid-off
faster offbreak, turned to square leg off the back foot
tossed on off, played back to the bowler off the front foot. That wraps up a maiden
full on off, whipped away to deep square leg
back of a length and outside off, defended to cover
short and on top of off, fended back to Thisara
on a length and outside off, run down to third man
shortish and outside off, Babar camps back and defends it back to Thisara
back of a length on off, twirled to deep square leg
Babar skips down the track, meets a half-volley on off, and drives a single to long-on
That's outta here! Malik sends it soaring over midwicket. Tossed up outside off, he races down the track and clubs it for a 93-metre hit. Such a clean swing
pushed through on off, stroked to long-on
looks like a googly, Babar, having come down the track, is hit on the thigh
pushed through on off, tapped to cover
darted on middle, defended
banged short and outside off, the batsman rides it down to third man
back of a length and angling into a tight defence on off
back of a length on top of off, firmly punched back to the bowler
back of a length on off, punched away to the left of short midwicket, mid-on tidies up
on a length and outside off, steered to point
full and on off, defended to cover
full on off, driven with the break to short midwicket
floated up on off, Babar steps out and defends it back
Babar uses his feet again, this is the legbreak, poked out to cover
very full on middle, bunted down to long-on for one
leg-stump ball, deflected fine for two
tossed on middle, defended to cover
back of a length and outside off, stabbed to point
full on off, worked to short midwicket off the front foot
back of a length and outside off, punched on the up to mid-off
skewed to midwicket off the inside half
full and outside off, slapped to mid-off off the front foot
clipped away to deep midwicket as this was full and straight
on a length and outside off, played to cover
tossed on the pads, clipped to square leg
knocked to short midwicket

pushed through on the leg stump, Babar goes low and bottom-edges a sweep fine on the leg side. He raises his bat and acknowledges his fifty. A pat on the head from Malik is part of the celebrations too
full-toss on middle, swatted away to deep midwicket for a double
back of a length and outside off, late cut away fine of third man
just short of a good length and outside off, Malik rocks back, rolls his wrists, and pulls to deep midwicket
hip-high short ball outside off, swatted away to deep midwicket
short and wide outside off, horrid ball, and it has been punished. Scythed in the air over backward point
full on off, driven to the left of mid-on for one
short and outside off, punched to the left of short cover
tossed on middle, driven down to long-on
worked off the back foot to midwicket
nudged to the right of midwicket now
full on middle, pushed down to long-on for one
speared on the pads, duly glanced away fine on the leg side
full on middle, patted to square leg
flighted on middle, defended back
skiddy delivery on middle, defended back again
tossed on off, dabbed to cover
Malik charges out, yorks himself, and drags an inside edge behind square
flatter and faster outside off stabbed to sweeper cover
bunted off the pads to short midwicket's right
back of a length at off stump, pushed to extra cover off the back foot
tossed up at leg stump, flicked to short fine
back of a length at middle stump, makes room and pokes it to extra cover
back of a length outside off, chopped straight to point with a late cut
good length at off stump, pushed to sweeper cover off the front foot
good length, pushed down leg side. Can't get bat on the attempted sweep and Dickwella can't gather
full at middle stump, backs away and drives to sweeper cover
tossed up in the corridor, squeezed out to sweeper cover
full at off stump, driven to sweeper cover
tossed up outside off, steps out and slips as he gets to the pitch and drives it wide of long-off. Twisted his ankle...that looked dangerous. But he's okay
back of a length at leg stump, poked through square leg off the back foot
back of a length at off stump, punched to cover point
floated up at off stump, drives to long-off and brings up his 41st fifty
full toss at leg stump, driven back at the bowler...who lets it go
good length at leg stump, steps out and offers the pad after being beaten in flight
good length at off stump, defended into the covers
good length outside off, poked to sweeper cover on the front foot
full at off stump, driven to long-off after skipping down
shot Steps out and doesn't allow the ball to turn. Good length and outside off but he's down quickly and ready for the ball to land. Creams it over the bowler's head
good length at off stump, pushed into the off side off an inside edge to the pad

oh shot of the day. Stunning. Length ball drifted in flat at off stump, but his feet are so quick. And he was always looking to go over cover, can't explain his position otherwise. Got sufficiently leg side, opened his body up and sent it sailing over extra cover
good length at off stump, pushed through the covers
back of a length slider at leg stump, tickles it fine
good length at off stump, defended back at the bowler
tossed up at middle stump, cramped for room this time after stepping out. Drives it to long-on
good length at middle stump, defended into the leg side
back of a length at middle stump, punched to long-on
back of a length at leg stump, flicked to short fine

fielder gets a hand at long-on but his weight was always moving backwards. He wasn't quite on the boundary line and had to reach out. Malik sliced this after stepping out and looking to go over midwicket

finishes with a six. Tossed up at middle stump, he's closer to the ball this time and goes straighter this time. Must have been off the toe-end because this hangs in the air a long time. But there is enough to clear the fielder at long-off
